Istana Respons YLBHI soal Dewas KPK: Pemerintah Kan Politis tapi Profesional
05 Nov 2019, 14:09 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Ketua Umum Yayasan Lembaga Bantuan Hukum Indonesia (YLBHI), Asfinawati, menyebut keberadaan dan pemilihan anggota Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) bersifat politis. Pihak Istana tak menepis tudingan itu.
"Pemerintah kan memang politis ya, kayak begitu," kata Jubir Presiden Fadjroel Rachman di Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Namun, Fadjroel mengatakan Jokowi tetap mengupayakan para anggota Dewas KPK dipilih berdasarkan kemampuan dan profesionalitas. Dia lagi-lagi menegaskan pilihan pemerintah memang bersifat politis.
"Diupayakan tetap menghargai kemampuan-kemampuan, yang sifatnya langsung. Kan kalau hukum langsung terkait dengan sikap profesionalnya. Bahwa pilihannya diambil sebuah pemerintah yang sifatnya politis, iya. Tetapi orang-orangnya tetap mewakili profesionalitas mereka. Kan nggak bisa menolak, pemerintah kan lembaga politis," ujarnya.

YLBHI Response Palace about Dewas KPK: The Government is Political but Professional
05 Nov 2019, 14:09 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Chairperson of the Indonesian Legal Aid Foundation (YLBHI), Asfinawati, said the existence and election of members of the KPK Supervisory Board (Dewas) by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) were political. The Palace did not dismiss the accusation.
"The government is indeed political, isn't it," said Presidential Spokesman Fadjroel Rachman at the Presidential Palace, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
However, Fadjroel said Jokowi continued to seek members of the Dewas KPK based on their abilities and professionalism. He again emphasized that the government's choice was indeed political.
"Efforts should be made to respect abilities, which are direct. If the law is directly related to their professional attitude. That the choice is made from a political government, yes. But the people still represent their professionalism. You cannot refuse, the government is a political institution. , "he said.
